eqcorrscan.scripts.synth_test module¶

Script to validate the synthetic detector method against test earthquakes

eqcorrscan.scripts.synth_test.match_synth(sfile, cont_base, freqmin=2.0, freqmax=10.0, samp_rate=100.0, threshold=8.0, threshold_type='MAD', trig_int=6.0, plotvar=True, save_template=True)[source]¶

Function to generate a basic synthetic from a real event, given by an s-file and cross-correlate this with the day of continuous data including the event

Parameters:
  • sfile (str) – Path to the s-file for the event
  • cont_base (str) – Path to the continuous data, should be in Yyyyy/Rjjj.01 directories
  • freqmin (float) – Low-cut for bandpass in Hz, defualts to 2.0
  • freqmax (float) – High-cut for bandpass in Hz, defaults to 10.0
  • samp_rate (float) – Desired sampling rate in Hz, defaults to 100.0
  • threshold (float) – Threshold for detection in cccsum, defaults to 8.0
  • threshold_type (str) – Type to threshold, either MAD or ABS, defaults to MAD
  • trig_int (float) – Trigger interval in seconds, defaults to 6.0
  • plotvar (bool) – To plot or not, defaults to true
Returns:

detections
eqcorrscan.scripts.synth_test.synth_from_sfile(sfile, samp_rate, length=10.0, PS_ratio=1.68)[source]¶

Function to generate a synthetic template for a given s-file

Parameters:
  • path (str) – Path to the sfile
  • samp_rate (float) – Sampling rate in Hz for template
  • length (float) – Length of templates in seconds, defaults to 10
  • PS_ratio (float) – S-P ratio to use if only one pick found for station, defaults to 1.68
Returns:

class:obspy.Stream
